EmailTemplate.description: This is the default email alert template invitation to the Survey: pre account survey
EmailTemplate.name: [Send using Workflow User] pre account survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Please complete this survey: pre account survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please complete this survey at:
{!IF(User.Id != null,IF(Case.Id != null,'http://tapan1-developer-edition.na15.force.com/timbasurveys__survey?id=a0oi0000001oxxfAAA&uId=' + User.Id + '&case_id=' + Case.Id + '&wf=yes','http://tapan1-developer-edition.na15.force.com/timbasurveys__survey?id=a0oi0000001oxxfAAA&uId=' + User.Id + '&wf=yes'),'')}
